name: Epic Roller Coasters
description: In Epic Roller Coasters you'll get the same feeling of a real roller coaster with a high level graphics, physics-based simulation. You'll go up and down seeing everything around you with our long range vision capabilities!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64bit) or higher Processor: Intel Core i5- 4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64bit) or higher Processor: Intel i5- 4590 equivalent or greater. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 AMD Radeon RX 480 (equivalent or better) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
